item.title: mjc add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: mjc add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: mjc add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: mjc add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: mjc add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Turn your wounds into wisdom." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: mjc add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Never, never, never give in!" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: mjc add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: mjc add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: mjc add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Literature is a luxury; fiction is a necessity." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: mjc add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Always be comic in a tragedy. What the deuce else can you do?" -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: mjc add a quote by G. K. Chesterton
item.description: "You say grace before meals. All right. But I say grace before the concert and the opera, and grace before the play and pantomime, and grace before I open a book, and grace before sketching, painting, swimming, fencing, boxing, walking, playing, dancing and grace before I dip the pen in the ink." -- G. K. Chesterton

item.title: mjc add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "When you have really exhausted an experience you always reverence and love it." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: mjc add a quote by Hillary Rodham Clinton
item.description: "It took a Clinton to clean up after the first Bush, it may take another Clinton to clean up after the second one" -- Hillary Rodham Clinton

item.title: mjc add a quote by Hillary Rodham Clinton
item.description: "Every child needs a champion." -- Hillary Rodham Clinton

item.title: mjc add a quote by Bill Clinton
item.description: "We all do better when we work together. Our differences do matter, but our common humanity matters more." -- Bill Clinton
